title: Watch Face - Minimus Interactive
summary: ★★Redefine The Minimalism of your Smartwatch. When Less Is More,Keep it Simple★★

descriptionHTML:
★★"Redefine the Minimalist Living: When Less Is More, Keep it Simple"★★


Minimus Interactive Watch Face !! A New Style Minimal Watch face with Hourly Chime Sound effect, Touch Sound Effects and many Interactive Features for Android Wear 2.0.


★Tap Features (*Available Only in Premium Version)

✔ Tap on WEATHER on main Watch Face to get 4 days Weather Forecast and Other Weather Info

✔ Tap on "CENTER" of Watch face for Interactive Stop watch

✔ Tap on "MENU" on Left side of Watch face for Apps Launcher

✔ Tap on "STEPS"to Get Google Fit Data

✔ Tap on "DATE Circle" on Lower side of Watch face to get Calendar Events




★ Free Version

✔ Unique Minimal Style Watch Face.
✔ Android Wear 2.0 Fully supported.
✔ Standalone watch face for iPhone and Android users.
✔ Phone and Watch battery
✔ Date, Day, Month Name
✔ Black & White Ambient Mode.
✔ HD Graphics for All Watches Resolutions



★ Premium Version Features

✔ Hourly Chime Sound effect and Vibration on every hour
✔ Touch Sound Effect and Touch Vibration
✔ Unique Minimal Watch Style, with Many Interactive Features
✔ 3 Minimal Watch Face Modes. Analog, Digital and Dual
✔ Watch Face Interactivity.
✔ 2 Minimal Watch Face Clock hands
✔ 3 Different type of Second Hand's tail
✔ 5 Type of Different Watch Face Markers to Choose
✔ Choose Between thousands of Custom Colors
✔ Very Cool Interactive Stop Watch For Sports Activity
✔ Unique Style Custom App Launcher Menu
✔ Agenda Info for Upcoming 4 Calendar Events
✔ Weather info , 4 days Forecast, High/Low Temp, Wind Speed, Sunset/Sunrise info
✔Two Weather Providers
✔ GPS or Manually Select Weather Location Option for Correct Weather
✔ Fully Accurate Pedometer with Google Fit Integration
✔ New Style Phone and Watch battery info
✔ Screen Bright Time Option
✔ Colorful and Black and White Ambient Modes
✔ 12/24 Hour Digital Clock.
✔ Tap on 5 Touch Points To Get Different Feature Select
✔ New Style Date, Day, Month Name




★Supported All Watches Resolutions

★Compatible with Android Wear Watch Only , Not for Samsung Watches

Moto 360 (1st Gen)
Moto 360 2015 (42mm, 46mm)
Moto 360 Sports
Huawei Watch
LG G Watch R
LG G Watch W100
LG Watch Urbane(1,2)
Sony Smartwatch 3
Samsung Gear Live
Asus ZenWatch(1 & 2)
Fossil Q
Casio WSD-F10
TAG Heuer


★How To Use

1. You Can Enable or Disable Sound effects and Vibration from Companion app.
2. Please Enable "Location" or "GPS" in Phone To get Weather Info.
3. Select Manual Weather Location in Companion App Settings
4. Change Custom App Shortcuts from Phone Settings
5 You can change Watch Face Hands, Marker and Watch Face Mode from companion App


★How do I install the watch face on Android Wear 1.0?

1. After install run 'Re-sync app' from the Android Wear app.
2. Long press your watch and choose "Minimus Interactive Watch Face" as your watch face, or select the watch face using the Android Wear app.



★How do I install the watch face on Android Wear 2.0?

1. Install it from Google Play Wear Store on your watch.
2. Install the companion app for fully customization (Android phone devices).


★Useful Tip
✔ Sometimes you need to wait longer for transfer to watch
✔I recommend a bit of patience .
✔This is not caused by the watch face, but rather Android Wear app.
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after few minutes, to try re-sync or follow these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face


★Follow Us on G+ For More Updates.. https://goo.gl/Ng5DhQ

★Visit Our Exclusive Wear face collection for Android Wear on the Play Store https://goo.gl/RxW9Cs

IMPORTANT NOTE: Your watch Must have speaker to get Hourly and touch Sound Effects.

NOTE: if you have any problem first email us before leaving a 1 star rating on play store, we will solve it
comments: I don't think this app deserves 5 stars as it's right now, but I gave it 5 as the current rating (3.3 stars is too low as well).  I really love the stely of the watchface and has some really useful settings, although I'm messing someother features that can be found in other watchfaces, although I have contacted with the developers they have taken my feedback and probably add those features. So kudos to them from that! Edit: The battery usage of the watchfaces is considerably higher than other ones, take that also into consideration. The creators might update it to make it more efficient.

Very good watch face. Works without problems and easy to install. I like the design and ínteractive functionality. Support is also excellent (very fast and responsive!). It is definitelly worth the little price for the premium version.
recentChanges: - Fix one App Touch issue, in App launcher.
- Fix some time ads shown in PREMIUM VERSION also.
- Now Phone battery shown more quickly in Watch face. (Fix phone battery not shown some time)
- Fix automatic Weather update time not working properly.
- More clear Free and Paid Version.
